proposal.rationale: User wants minimal third-party tools; prefer built-in venv/pip and dotnet only.
proposal.new_content: Default to built-in Python venv/pip and dotnet CLI on Windows. Treat uv/poetry/npm as optional and require explicit approval before use. Prefer PowerShell commands when suggesting setup.

proposal.rationale: Windows context with mixed Python + .NET stack.
proposal.new_content: On Windows, verify Python 3.11+ and .NET 9.0 SDK (plus 8.0 runtime if needed). Use `py -3.11 -m venv .venv` and `dotnet --info` before any package installs.
